blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Monthly Follower Recs!
body:
Follower recs of July 2018.

Anonymous

Between the Screens (ao3) - concavepointdexter

Summary: Phil Lester is meeting Dan Howell for the first time in 2018, but Dan is the boy he was in 2009. How will they react to this new relationship, especially with a ten year age gap? is it meant to be, or will it be too little, too late?

Breakfast for Three (ao3) - t_hens

Summary: It’s just a normal morning for Dan and Phil until a long awaited phone call arrives.

Carry Me (ao3) - AgingPhangirl (Madophelia)

Summary: He’s not obsessed. It really doesn’t matter what Louise says. “You’re looking again.” “At what?” “Your roommate.” Phil isn’t looking. He’s checking. “Pass the butter,” is what he says instead. “You have butter.” “I need more butter.”

Code Black (ao3) - starboydjh

Summary: “Code black: An influx of patients so great, there aren’t enough resources to treat them. The average A&E is in code black 5 times per year. St. Thomas’ Memorial Hospital in London is in code black 300 times per year.” Doctors Dan Howell and Phil Lester know all too well that when everything in the busiest accident and emergency department in England and their personal lives goes right, the most incredible of miracles can happen. After Dan bares the struggles of his past to Phil, a member of Dan’s distant and troubled family shows up as a patient in their A&E one night after years of silence, and life starts to feel like one long code black night in more ways than one.

Hanging Out With Corpses (ao3) -  parentaladvisorybullshitcontent

Summary: In which Phil is a lonely ex-vampire hunter living in the city and Dan’s just a pretty guy who doesn’t sleep and wears a lot of black…right?

Hi Dan (wattpad) - SlimShadyLester

Hi Dan.

It’s Phil

I still love you

L'Histoire Française (ao3) - danfanciesphil (thejigsawtimess)

Summary: Since he can remember, Dan has had a bad experience with teachers. When desperate times call for him to take a job as a TA at his local secondary school, he is dreading the experience. Cue Phil Lester: eclectic, vivacious History teacher whom the students and teachers adore for his fantastical, unique methods and sincere passion for his job. Dan was expecting all sorts of drama in his new job, but falling for a member of the faculty was not part of it.

Traffic Lights (ao3) - Ash_Writes

Summary: safewording drabble

@existingcourage

Our Lives Don’t Collide (ao3) - 332Roses

Summary: Shit hits the fan when famous actor!Phil is caught smooching a boy in an alleyway. Only problem? He’s not out and what’s worse? The boy he was smooching was a journalist who set it all up to get a quick picture and now Phil is royally screwed. The only answer Phil’s management can come up with is a fake relationship to try and do damage control and famous actor!Dan is the perfect candidate.

@rwdaf

Stupid with love (ao3) - phanitup

Summary: Phil fell in love with Dan and never fell out of it. Dan was never in love in the first place.

What You Feel (ao3) - phanitup

Summary: Dan and Phil use a double ended vibrator together.

blog.name: philsgaypillow
blog.title: a gay piece of home
blog.description: abbie|19|hufflepuff|she/her|👩🏻‍🎨 my art 👩🏻‍🎨 eleanor .🌸🌿header by lemonheadlester🌿🌸

summary: Are they in love? summary: Dan and Phil’s son Phoenix asks them to tell him a happy bedtime story, so phil tells the one he...
body:
Are they in love?

summary: Dan and Phil’s son Phoenix asks them to tell him a happy bedtime story, so phil tells the one he knows best. 

Rating: G

Warning: None

Genre: Alternative Reality

its very short.


aka, phil tells their son their story but changes their names to Dustin and Patrick.

    It’s 5:30 on a Tuesday and Dan is getting Phoenix ready for bed, while Phil is getting supper ready. They have to be up early in the morning for his annual check-up with the pediatrician, so they are having an early meal. This will be the first time he is aware of the shots he’s getting, both Dan and Phil are worried about how Phoenix will react so they haven't told him yet. 

   Dan finally gets Phoenix to take his Thor shirt off and change into his pajamas, by promising he will wash it tonight so he can wear it tomorrow. Phoenix slides a velociraptor t-shirt over his head and pulls on his favorite allosaurus bottoms before running downstairs and meeting his dads in the dining room.

   Phil made spaghetti with miniature meatballs, Phoenix knew that meant he was about to get conned into doing something he didn’t want to do, but he didn’t question it since he really loves mini meatballs. 

   They finish supper and go into the lounge to watch a movie before bed like they always do and it was Phil’s turn to pick the movie, he chose The Neverending Story since he knows it makes Phoenix so happy every time he sees the luck dragon on the screen. And it makes him sleepy which is always a good thing when they have an early morning ahead of them.

    The movie ends and Phoenix jumps up from the sofa and claps excitedly before letting out a yawn. 

“Alright bubby, its time for bed,” Phil says standing up from the sofa and spreading his arms with a smile, ”upsie daisy” 

Phoenix raised his arms for his dad to pick him up. Phil lifted the 4-year old into his arms and began to carry him up the stairs to Pheonix’s bedroom, dan following shortly behind. 

   They all 3 enter Phoenix’s room, Phil sets their son down on the floor and Dan looks at the spider-man clock hanging on the wall that reads 8:43. 

“Damn, that late already?” Dan says in shock.

“Language, Daniel!” Phil exclaims while gesturing his head towards Phoenix. 

Dan explains “whoops! sorry dear, I'm still getting used to not swearing.” 

“That’s alright Danny, I know you are trying” smiling sweetly at his husband

“Alright kiddo lets tuck you in,” Dan says to Phoenix who was climbing under his blanket.

Phoenix wiggles his body under the blanket until only his little face is poking out of the top, making both his dads giggle, they walk over to his bed. Dan sits on the floor next to it while Phil tucks in Phoenix saying “snug as a bug in a rug” emphasizing every tuck. Phil gave him a kiss on the forehead, Dan then stands to do the same. they say goodnight and walk towards the door.

“can you tell me a bedtime story?” Phoenix says right before they get completely out his door.

“of course!” Dan replies “what kind of story?” Phil finishes

“one that will make me happy!” Phoenix says with a big smile on his face

“I have the perfect one,” Phil says looking at dan and attempting to wink.

“well go on then,” Dan says lovingly, sitting on the bean bag on their son’s floor

Phil began, “Once, a really long time ago, not that far from here, there were these two guys. Dustin, and Patrick. They lived 300 miles apart, they had never met, they didn’t even know the other existed. Until one day, one very good day, Dustin happened upon Patrick’s Twitter, and thought he was really cute.” Dan chuckled

“So like any smart young boy would do, he tweeted Patrick, and followed him, hoping he might be noticed. He stalked Patrick and learned everything about him, every day tweeting him more and more, hoping to be seen.“

"But what Dustin didn’t realize was, he was being seen, Patrick was just very scared to reply because he also thought Dustin was very cute, and he was scared if Dustin knew the real him he wouldn’t like him anymore.”

“But finally, after 4 months of getting tweets from Dustin, Patrick finally replied. and soon replied became messages, and messages because texts, and texts became calls, and those calls moved to skype, until finally after almost 6 months, they decided to meet in person.” Phil continued, smiling at Dan

“Neither of them knew their feelings were mutual, but they were both okay with being just friends as long as they had the other in their life. But the day they met in person for the first time they realized, they were already more than just friends, they were best friends , and other the next few months they visited each other regularly, gradually growing closed, and slowly.”

“And then eventually, after almost 2 years, they moved in together. And it was thw best desition they could have made. They had a few fights, some worse than others, but they knew, in the end, they would always bounce back.”

“They moved from their first house together to the second, and from the second to the third, and from the third, they moved into the fourth, and that’s where they stay, because of no matter where they move, they know, that they are already home as long as they have each other.” Phil finished as tears were welling in Dan’s eyes.

“are they in love daddy?” Phoenix asked with a yawn

“that's up to you to decide sweetheart” Phil answered

“I think they are,” Phoenix said with a smile

“then there’s your answer,” Phil said gleefully “now time for bed”

Phoenix rolled over in bed after both his dads gave him a kiss on his forehead once again. Dan and Phil walked out and slowly closed their son’s door.

while walking down the hall to their room Dan says “I know they are”

“me too” phil replied, lacing his fingers with Dan’s


This was the first to I’ve wrote an actual fhanfic, please don’t judge too harshly. 💛

“Language, Daniel!” Phil exclaims while gesturing his head towards Phoenix. 

Dan explains “whoops! sorry dear, I'm still getting used to not swearing.” 

“That’s alright Danny, I know you are trying” smiling sweetly at his husband

“Alright kiddo lets tuck you in,” Dan says to Phoenix who was climbing under his blanket.

Phoenix wiggles his body under the blanket until only his little face is poking out of the top, making both his dads giggle, they walk over to his bed. Dan sits on the floor next to it while Phil tucks in Phoenix saying “snug as a bug in a rug” emphasizing every tuck. Phil gave him a kiss on the forehead, Dan then stands to do the same. they say goodnight and walk towards the door.

“can you tell me a bedtime story?” Phoenix says right before they get completely out his door.

“of course!” Dan replies “what kind of story?” Phil finishes

“one that will make me happy!” Phoenix says with a big smile on his face

“I have the perfect one,” Phil says looking at dan and attempting to wink.

“well go on then,” Dan says lovingly, sitting on the bean bag on their son’s floor

Phil began, “Once, a really long time ago, not that far from here, there were these two guys. Dustin, and Patrick. They lived 300 miles apart, they had never met, they didn’t even know the other existed. Until one day, one very good day, Dustin happened upon Patrick’s Twitter, and thought he was really cute.” Dan chuckled

“So like any smart young boy would do, he tweeted Patrick, and followed him, hoping he might be noticed. He stalked Patrick and learned everything about him, every day tweeting him more and more, hoping to be seen.“

"But what Dustin didn’t realize was, he was being seen, Patrick was just very scared to reply because he also thought Dustin was very cute, and he was scared if Dustin knew the real him he wouldn’t like him anymore.”

“But finally, after 4 months of getting tweets from Dustin, Patrick finally replied. and soon replied became messages, and messages because texts, and texts became calls, and those calls moved to skype, until finally after almost 6 months, they decided to meet in person.” Phil continued, smiling at Dan

“Neither of them knew their feelings were mutual, but they were both okay with being just friends as long as they had the other in their life. But the day they met in person for the first time they realized, they were already more than just friends, they were best friends , and other the next few months they visited each other regularly, gradually growing closed, and slowly.”

“And then eventually, after almost 2 years, they moved in together. And it was thw best desition they could have made. They had a few fights, some worse than others, but they knew, in the end, they would always bounce back.”

“They moved from their first house together to the second, and from the second to the third, and from the third, they moved into the fourth, and that’s where they stay, because of no matter where they move, they know, that they are already home as long as they have each other.” Phil finished as tears were welling in Dan’s eyes.

“are they in love daddy?” Phoenix asked with a yawn

“that's up to you to decide sweetheart” Phil answered

“I think they are,” Phoenix said with a smile

“then there’s your answer,” Phil said gleefully “now time for bed”

Phoenix rolled over in bed after both his dads gave him a kiss on his forehead once again. Dan and Phil walked out and slowly closed their son’s door.

while walking down the hall to their room Dan says “I know they are”

“me too” phil replied, lacing his fingers with Dan’s


This was the first to I’ve wrote an actual fhanfic, please don’t judge too harshly. 💛
trail.content:
Are they in love?

summary: Dan and Phil’s son Phoenix asks them to tell him a happy bedtime story, so phil tells the one he knows best. 

Rating: G

Warning: None

Genre: Alternative Reality

its very short.


aka, phil tells their son their story but changes their names to Dustin and Patrick.

    It’s 5:30 on a Tuesday and Dan is getting Phoenix ready for bed, while Phil is getting supper ready. They have to be up early in the morning for his annual check-up with the pediatrician, so they are having an early meal. This will be the first time he is aware of the shots he’s getting, both Dan and Phil are worried about how Phoenix will react so they haven't told him yet. 

   Dan finally gets Phoenix to take his Thor shirt off and change into his pajamas, by promising he will wash it tonight so he can wear it tomorrow. Phoenix slides a velociraptor t-shirt over his head and pulls on his favorite allosaurus bottoms before running downstairs and meeting his dads in the dining room.

   Phil made spaghetti with miniature meatballs, Phoenix knew that meant he was about to get conned into doing something he didn’t want to do, but he didn’t question it since he really loves mini meatballs. 

   They finish supper and go into the lounge to watch a movie before bed like they always do and it was Phil’s turn to pick the movie, he chose The Neverending Story since he knows it makes Phoenix so happy every time he sees the luck dragon on the screen. And it makes him sleepy which is always a good thing when they have an early morning ahead of them.

    The movie ends and Phoenix jumps up from the sofa and claps excitedly before letting out a yawn. 

“Alright bubby, its time for bed,” Phil says standing up from the sofa and spreading his arms with a smile, ”upsie daisy” 

Phoenix raised his arms for his dad to pick him up. Phil lifted the 4-year old into his arms and began to carry him up the stairs to Pheonix’s bedroom, dan following shortly behind. 

   They all 3 enter Phoenix’s room, Phil sets their son down on the floor and Dan looks at the spider-man clock hanging on the wall that reads 8:43. 

“Damn, that late already?” Dan says in shock.

“Language, Daniel!” Phil exclaims while gesturing his head towards Phoenix. 

Dan explains “whoops! sorry dear, I'm still getting used to not swearing.” 

“That’s alright Danny, I know you are trying” smiling sweetly at his husband

“Alright kiddo lets tuck you in,” Dan says to Phoenix who was climbing under his blanket.

Phoenix wiggles his body under the blanket until only his little face is poking out of the top, making both his dads giggle, they walk over to his bed. Dan sits on the floor next to it while Phil tucks in Phoenix saying “snug as a bug in a rug” emphasizing every tuck. Phil gave him a kiss on the forehead, Dan then stands to do the same. they say goodnight and walk towards the door.

“can you tell me a bedtime story?” Phoenix says right before they get completely out his door.

“of course!” Dan replies “what kind of story?” Phil finishes

“one that will make me happy!” Phoenix says with a big smile on his face

“I have the perfect one,” Phil says looking at dan and attempting to wink.

“well go on then,” Dan says lovingly, sitting on the bean bag on their son’s floor

Phil began, “Once, a really long time ago, not that far from here, there were these two guys. Dustin, and Patrick. They lived 300 miles apart, they had never met, they didn’t even know the other existed. Until one day, one very good day, Dustin happened upon Patrick’s Twitter, and thought he was really cute.” Dan chuckled

“So like any smart young boy would do, he tweeted Patrick, and followed him, hoping he might be noticed. He stalked Patrick and learned everything about him, every day tweeting him more and more, hoping to be seen.“

"But what Dustin didn’t realize was, he was being seen, Patrick was just very scared to reply because he also thought Dustin was very cute, and he was scared if Dustin knew the real him he wouldn’t like him anymore.”

“But finally, after 4 months of getting tweets from Dustin, Patrick finally replied. and soon replied became messages, and messages because texts, and texts became calls, and those calls moved to skype, until finally after almost 6 months, they decided to meet in person.” Phil continued, smiling at Dan

“Neither of them knew their feelings were mutual, but they were both okay with being just friends as long as they had the other in their life. But the day they met in person for the first time they realized, they were already more than just friends, they were best friends , and other the next few months they visited each other regularly, gradually growing closed, and slowly.”

“And then eventually, after almost 2 years, they moved in together. And it was thw best desition they could have made. They had a few fights, some worse than others, but they knew, in the end, they would always bounce back.”

“They moved from their first house together to the second, and from the second to the third, and from the third, they moved into the fourth, and that’s where they stay, because of no matter where they move, they know, that they are already home as long as they have each other.” Phil finished as tears were welling in Dan’s eyes.

“are they in love daddy?” Phoenix asked with a yawn

“that's up to you to decide sweetheart” Phil answered

“I think they are,” Phoenix said with a smile

“then there’s your answer,” Phil said gleefully “now time for bed”

Phoenix rolled over in bed after both his dads gave him a kiss on his forehead once again. Dan and Phil walked out and slowly closed their son’s door.

while walking down the hall to their room Dan says “I know they are”

“me too” phil replied, lacing his fingers with Dan’s

title: rize livestream - 8/2/18
body:
• phil clarified they DIDN’T shower togehter
  • they’re discussing the specific part of the vagina that’s the fanny… we literally had to listen to dan and phil name different anatomical parts of the vagina.
  • phil’s official review of jumpsuit is “quite catchy” 
  • phil’s merch is coming out this month! the current issue is that some of the labels (not the actual merch) still have the fringe on it, so they’re trying to fix it. he’ll start a countdown on his twitter soon! 
  • they said that their day in los angeles would be “busy” 
  • possibly a new sims video soon!
  • giveaway winners WERE NOT ANNOUNCED; the giveaway goes on for the next two weeks.
  • the next livestream will NOT be next thursday, as they’ll be in los angeles that day. it’ll be either tuesday, wednesday, or friday; they’ll let us know!
